body.name: Goowin Shower Curtain Hooks, 12 Pcs Shower Curtain Rings, Stainless Steel Black Shower Curtain Hooks Rings Rust Proof, Smooth Sliding Anti-Drop Double Shower Curtain Hooks for Shower Curtain Rods
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 22 hrs 2 mins
features: [RUSTPROOF STRUCTURE]: The shower curtain hooks are made of stainless steel with an electroplating process to resist rust and corrosion, perfect for bathroom environment.
[SLIDING SMOOTHLY]: The shower curtain rings are designed with special spherical balls, which makes it easy to slide on the shower curtain rod without scratching the shower curtain rod.

[DOUBLE SHOWER HOOKS]: The black shower curtain hooks are made by exquisite craft. The obstacle on both sides fix the rollwer balls to keep balance, which prevent shower curtain from falling off, it's strong enough to hold both heavy curtain and liner.

[BEAUTIFUL & ELEGANT]: The electroplating shower curtain hooks rust proof design as simple and generous style, suitable for both retro and modern bathroom. It can last for long-term use and won't fade.

[PACKAGING & WARRANTY]: Set of 12 shower hooks for curtain fits all standard size shower curtain rods. If you have any questions, please contact us in time and we will make sure you are satisfied with the answer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These clips are so easy to hang, are made of a great solid material and they look beautiful. They are thick enough to work great but not too heavy. My shower curtain finally slides beautifully with no tugging. Great matte black color, too! I think they’ll be easy to clean, if needed, as I can just wipe with a damp cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Goowin Shower Curtain Hooks are a fantastic find, especially considering their affordable price point. These hooks have proven to be a reliable addition to my bathroom setup. One of the standout features is their durability - they don't rust, which is a common issue with shower curtain hooks (or at least for mine), and they glide smoothly along the curtain rod without scraping or causing any damage. This makes for a seamless and hassle-free experience when opening and closing the shower curtain. Also, the lack of closure is a really nice touch, as I hate how hard it is to squeeze the hooks open and closed every time I need to wash the curtain. With 12 hooks included in each pack, it's a great deal that provides both quality and quantity. For their budget-friendly price, these hooks offer excellent value and are a smart choice for anyone in search of dependable, rust-resistant, and rod-friendly shower curtain hooks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use..fast install..separates nicely
reviews.reviewText: Install was fast..looks good..sli des nicely...still working and nothing has broken or rusted. I'd recommend to all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good if you use an inner and outer shower curtain
reviews.reviewText: These are far easier to install and maintain than the clip-style rings. The nice looking chrome clippies bend very easily when you pull off your shower curtain for cleaning. I find these much easier to use, so I manage to keep my shower curtain much cleaner. They also prevent bunching and maintain some space between the inner and outer layers. I also find they move on the shower curtain rod much more easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid shower hooks, good design & value
reviews.reviewText: So far, loving these shower curtain hooks. The dual sided hooks are such a handy feature. Keeps my liner nicely separated from my fabric curtain. Very reasonable price. Easy install. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are very lightweight but sturdy enough. They're easy to install and change out curtains/liners as needed (I like that you don't have to take off both the curtain and the liner just to change one of them). They slide back and forth easily which is a plus and the price is great. Just buy them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are SO cute and honestly work pretty effectively. My shower curtains move easily and don’t get caught up on things. The reason why I bought these is because my old ones would get caught on each other and they were just downright ugly and broken. I LOVE these shower hooks. Also did great for my mental health. The small stuff counts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ease of implantation
reviews.reviewText: a very useful product for keeping curtains especially the bathroom plastic curtains. As this is not a complete ring, all you have to do is pass it over the rod, no fixing and no other manipulation.

I had both shower curtains on one plastic shower curtain ring for such a long time. They always got stuck on the shower pole when you slide the curtain, they were such a pain when I wanted to take the shower curtains down to wash them so I decided to give these a shot. Total game changer! The hooks have little beads on the top that roll, so no more sticking on the shower pole!! The curtain just slides along with ease!!! And having each curtain on it's own hook will make it so much easier to remove them for washing. I should have bought these a long time ago!!!
Bin zufrieden lässt sich super verwenden um verschiedene Dinge daran aufzuhängen !!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, easy to attach to, absolute dream when drawing the curtains, glides smoothly. Beats the 'step' in the expandable pole with ease.Don't have to remove both curtains to just get one off to wash.Definitely one of those 'I didn't know I needed it' items until you try them.Cracker of product.
Works just as I wanted. Sturdy and rings never fall off or have curtain fall off. Practical, smart design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These work well. Easy to fit, both inner and outer shower curtains are still in place. Would recommend.
